oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Jim Crow [a horse] will stand this season at my stable" 1885
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement by W. N. Gill offering the stud services of two horses named Jim Crow and Jack Bourbon. The sires and dams of both horses are mentioned.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Broadsides; Horses
